text.0: swift soma drops have been effused in streams of meath the gladdening drink.
text.1: for sacred lore of every kind.
text.2: hither to newer restingplace the ancient living ones are come.
text.3: they made the sun that he might shine.
text.4: o pavamana bring to us the unsacrificing foemans wealth.
text.5: and give us food with progeny.
text.6: the living somas being cleansed diffuse exhilarating drink.
text.7: turned to the vat which drips with meath.
text.8: soma gows on intelligent possessing sap and mighty strength.
text.9: brave hero who repels the curse.
text.10: for indra soma thou art cleansed a feastcompanion for the gods.
text.11: ndu thou fain wilt win us strength.
text.12: when he had drunken draughts of this indra smote down resistless foes.
text.13: yea smote them and shall smite them still.
